time_with_med.Description: Time elapsed between the start of medetomidine administration and the start of the fMRI run

participant_id.Description: ID of the rat, from sub-01 to sub-24

run.Description: The fMRI run ID - ascending number for the specific task type (efs/rs) within the same anesthesia session

filename.Description: Path from the current directory to the fMRI run nifti file
